Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
... if GetParam does not retrieve any value, perhaps if not set in FL start routine
-- Reset variables
-- First 3 characters if contain a separator has to be stored to DHSH, e.g. 'C&A', with separators
-- Detect separartors within the full string
...replace separator characters with ||| so that StrToken works, see next Block While
-- Extract substrings
create DHSH record, ignore tokens with LEN()=1
-- Reset variables
-- Detect separartors within the full string
...replace separator characters with ||| so that StrToken works, see next Block While
-- Extract substrings
... a house number is detected (if substring starts with a numeric 1-9)
... else substring is part of street namea, ignore tokens with LEN()=1
-- Reset variables
-- Check if city string starts with zip code
... if True then we create a DHSH with type=5 for the zipcode (without intermediate blanks)
... remove zipcode from city sting for further extraction
-- Detect separartors within the remaining string
...replace separator characters with ||| so that StrToken works, see next Block While
-- Extract substrings
create DHSH record, ignore tokens with LEN()=1
found space char and prev. char is blank as well => ignore ...
